scripts.build: bun run build:app && bun run build:backend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:app && bun run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:app && bun run lint:fix:backend
scripts.format: bun run format:app && bun run format:backend
scripts.format:fix: bun run format:fix:app && bun run format:fix:backend
scripts.check: bun run check:app && bun run check:backend
scripts.check:fix: bun run check:fix:app && bun run check:fix:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf app/node_modules backend/node_modules app/dist backend/dist app/.vite
scripts.install:all: bun install && bun run --cwd app install && bun run --cwd backend install
